physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Afebrile; normal cranial nerves; brisk upper-extremity reflexes; lower-extremity muscle strength noted: iliopsoas 3/5 (R) and 1/5 (L), quadriceps 3/5 (R) and 1/5 (L), dorsiflexors 2/5 (R) and 1/5 (L), plantar flexors 4/5 (R) and 3/5 (L); absent lower-extremity reflexes except trace right-ankle jerk; bilateral downward Babinski reflex.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: On hospital day 2, weakness progressed to both upper extremities.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: New areas of hyperintensity in C3 through C7 consistent with anterior horn-cell disease noted on imaging.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening of muscle weakness and addition of severe muscular limb pain.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Biceps strength decreased to 3/5 on the right side and 2/5 on the left; electromyography consistent with anterior horn-cell disease.
Worsening liver dysfunction; development of pneumonia and respiratory failure.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Deterioration in overall condition leading to withdrawal of support.
